dataSources.name: Litecoind
dataSources.description: Litecoin is the silver to Bitcoin's gold. It has 2.5 minute blocktimes, uses Scrypt as it's mining algorithm, and has a supply limit of 84 million coins. Transaction fees are typically cheaper than BTC's due to faster blocktimes. You should allow for at least 1 confirmation.

dataSources.name: Bitcoind
dataSources.description: The golden standard of cryptocurrency. It has 10 minute blocktimes, uses SHA-256 as it's mining algorithm, and a supply limit of 21 million. When accepting payments, allow for at least 1 confirmation.
